BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO EST_COMPLAINT_CAT_MST (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID, GNUM_SLNO, STR_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_NAME, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE EST_COMPLAINT_CAT_MST SET STR_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_NAME=?,GNUM_ISVALID=?, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GSTR_REMARKS=? WHERE NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_COMPLAINT_CAT_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1) WHERE T.NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=?

INSERT INTO EST_COMPLAINT_CAT_MST (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID, GNUM_SLNO, STR_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_NAME, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE EST_COMPLAINT_CAT_MST T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE T.NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_COMPLAINT_CAT_MST SET STR_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_NAME=?,GNUM_ISVALID=?, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=?,GSTR_REMARKS=? WHERE NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_COMPLAINT_CAT_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1) WHERE T.NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO EST_COMPLAINT_CAT_MST (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID, GNUM_SLNO, STR_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_NAME, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE EST_COMPLAINT_CAT_MST T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')), T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_COMPLAINT_CAT_MST T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
